VideoOverlay.setSegmentLoop

Function/Meaning
Set loop between frames
Type
Method of VideoOverlay class
Syntax
setSegmentLoop(comeFrame, goFrame)
Arguments
comeFrame Loop destination frame (loop start frame). When playback reaches goFrame, the playhead moves to this frame.
goFrame Loop end frame. When the display of the frame immediately preceding this one finishes, the playhead moves to comeFrame.
Return Value
None (void)
Description
Performs loop processing between the specified frames.
At the loop end (goFrame), an onPeriod event occurs.
A keyframe must be set at the comeFrame in the movie file.
If not set, the playback position will move to the keyframe closest to the specified frame when moving from the loop end to the start.
Reference
VideoOverlay.cancelSegmentLoop
VideoOverlay.onPeriod
VideoOverlay.segmentLoopStartFrame
VideoOverlay.segmentLoopEndFrame
